Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 103 not out off 97 balls to help India beat Bangladesh by 7 wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed that he wanted to make a big contribution and convert his half-centuries in World Cups
Miscellaneous Highlights: India stays second in the points table with 8 points from 4 games, trailing New Zealand on net run-rate
Others: India's all-rounder Hardik Pandya hobbled off with a twisted left ankle during the match
